game.name: Once Upon A KATAMARI
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 시대를 굴려라 시간을 넘어 세상을 돌며 덩어리를 굴리는 여행담. 굴리며 뭉치며 크게 만드는 것은 「괴혼」에선 익숙한 일. 이번엔 새로운 세계에서 마음 가는 대로 굴리자.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Once upon a time a katamari rolled through both past and present. In this story across time, the adage endures: Let The Good Times Roll! Now onward through new worlds to roll up thy heart's desires and to restore the stars!
